Boruto, Naruto, and Hinata charge at their opponent. Boruto accidentally drops his [[Extreme: Shinobi Picture Scrolls]] cards, rushing to recover a specific card, while Naruto helps him. Hinata spots a Santa version of her card by the opponent, and embarrassed by it, pushes her husband and son towards them with the Gentle Fist to keep them from seeing it. She is still embarrassed when Naruto recovers the card.
